products.title: Oslo Blackout Rosewood Pink Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Oslo Blackout Rosewood Pink Roller Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £7.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Oslo Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. 
 
This soft Rosewood Pink roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control.  The soft dusty rosewood pink fabric will work beautifully with natural wooden tones throughout the home. Our rollers are great for privacy and light control. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This pink roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product ID: DB-PRBX0033 Fabric Colour: Rosewood Pink Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Konya Blackout Hot Pink
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Konya Blackout Hot Pink Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya Blackout Hot Pink Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.
